title: very good location. good rooms. nice breakfast.
text: a very nice hotel, located very good. nice breakfast (muffin, juice, coffe/tea).the service is fine, not incredible, but fine.parking is 12$ near the hotel or 6$ 5min walk.you can get to city center in 10min slow walk.the eara is filled with nice bars/pubs/restaurants.you get a very good worth for your money.
